title: How to Find Profitable Keywords and Niches With Publisher Rocket
description:
In this video, I provide you with an 'over the shoulder' look at how I research profitable books, keywords, and niches to publish Amazon KDP books using Publisher Rocket and Amazon Search.

Information mentioned in this video:
